name: AimerBall
description: AimerBall is an indie arcade action game where you need to take your aim and shoot the balls to take out different shapes. You only have 1 ball to shoot at the start. You need to decide about its direction and plan it so that it hits more than 1 object on its way. Once the ball hits bonus balls, you get more balls to shoot in the next round. Remember - you only have to make one aim and all the balls you have will go in the exactly same direction. Use the balls smartly and calculate the best way possible.
